popularityCurve.label: why no sensor stabilization nikon seems committed to lens vr indeed they produced slides showing how much better lens vr is than sensor vr at the d3 launch and introduced the remaining exotic telephoto lenses in their vr versions and it's at the telephoto end that the differences become more pronounced curiously the 24-70mm didn't have vr a critical mistake as far as i'm concerned as nikon continues to send mixed signals to users will there be a vr mid-range zoom that covers fx at some point there should be if nikon continues to stand by lens stabilization but the fact that we haven't got it yet is a silly marketing mistake and one that leaves them out of parity with canon
